comments.content: Hi~nice to meet you!I want to improve my ability of english.If it is possible,my goal is to get 750 points below in new toeic test after a year later.Could u give me some suggestions about how to prepare for the exam?Thank u~😊

first.content: Hello :) nice to meet you too ! I never took Toeic before but there are some main things you could do to improve your scores ! Find a foreigner and practice English together , memorize 50 vocabulary per day , read newspaper CNN or Taipei Times ， read novels  , and if u think you still need more practice then it's essential to find a tutor! Hope this help ;)
first.name: Rack
